query:
SELECT id, name, parentId, 
(SELECT name FROM productCategories p2 WHERE p2.id = p1.parentId) as parent_name
FROM productCategories p1 
WHERE name IN ('海水淡化装置', '油水分离器')
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ymh12nCSeHu8Na.root --database nb9WvzpHUTfcigQwoxqRAZ --execute SELECT id, name, parentId, 
(SELECT name FROM productCategories p2 WHERE p2.id = p1.parentId) as parent_name
FROM productCategories p1 
WHERE name IN ('海水淡化装置', '油水分离器')
stdout:
id	name	parentId	parent_name
120	油水分离器	116	污水处理装置
118	海水淡化装置	116	污水处理装置
